definition: to perch/to rest (of birds)/to dwell/to live/to stay
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: I also may take shelter in a tree.
sentences.chinese: 我也可能将栖身之所安在树上。

sentences.english: It resides in the particular things thathe delighted to record.
sentences.chinese: 它就栖身于塞林格满怀欣喜记录下来的那些事物中。

sentences.english: Lewis. A Mars rampant with life. A water-covered Venus populated with floating, living islands.
sentences.chinese: 水覆盖下的金星移居来一些漂泊的栖身用的“岛屿”。

sentences.english: Now microbes are appearing far outside their environmental niches.
sentences.chinese: 现在微生物远远超出了它们的栖身环境。

sentences.english: Would you afford a poor child a temporary shelter ?
sentences.chinese: 您愿意给一位可怜的孩子提供暂时的栖身之地吗？

sentences.english: Many of the displaced are sheltering in schools.
sentences.chinese: 许多无家可归的人现在在学校暂时栖身。

sentences.english: From the "shelter" to the "spiritual home" building growth-oriented community forums.
sentences.chinese: 从“栖身之所”到“精神家园”打造生长型社区论坛。

sentences.english: Primitive tribes live in the Amarizonaon River pot.
sentences.chinese: 原始部落栖身在亚马逊河盆地。

sentences.english: This river is the natural habitat of fisher.
sentences.chinese: 这条河是食鱼貂的自然栖身地。

sentences.english: There will be accommodation for 600 personal servants and staff.
sentences.chinese: 这座豪华官邸将可容纳600个家丁和工作人员栖身。

sentences.english: Flickering high- rise, boundless and indistinct sea of faces, where be the ground of my stay?
sentences.chinese: 幢幢高楼，茫茫人海，哪里是我的栖身之地？

sentences.english: The  spy is shy of taking  shelter on the shelf of the shell-like  shed.
sentences.chinese: 间谍怕在壳子一样的棚里的架子上栖身。

sentences.english: The bear settled in for the winter in its cave.
sentences.chinese: 这头熊栖身在它的洞里过冬。

sentences.english: I've found my niche in life. This is the career for me.
sentences.chinese: 我已找到了栖身之处，这种事业最适合我。

sentences.english: Hundreds of cellars and air-raid shelters are being rented out as living spaces in the Chinese capital.
sentences.chinese: 在北京，许多人租用地下室和防空洞作为栖身之所。

sentences.english: These provide shelters for the homeless.
sentences.chinese: 这些无家可归的人提供了栖身之处。

definition: to make one's home/to take shelter
to find a place where one can fit in/to make one's home/to seek shelter
to stay for a time/to stop over/to lodge/to sink down (into soft ground)/leftovers
to hide/to go into hiding/to take refuge
to conceal oneself/to go into hiding/to take cover
to settle down/to set up a home
to give shelter from the wind and rain/to keep out the elements
settle down and get on with one's pursuit
to offer shelter/to have sb in one's care
